name: POLYGANOTES
description:
A reaction-rhythm game where you must switch between shapes to destroy them in time with the tunes!

This was my first game jam game. I am aware that the UI and graphics kind of suck and the save system might have bugs, but I'm glad I could get this done just barely in time. I had no time to make more songs though :(

WHY ISN'T THERE A WEBGL BUILD?

I was running low on time and I got an error that meant I couldn't use a certain audio clip in the WebGL version.

BUGS

-"Beep" is absolutely broken, sometimes. The shape is wrong all the time; just fiddle with the switcher to get the right one. "Chiptune" works fine.

WELL? WHAT DO YOU HAVE TO SAY FOR YOURSELF?

I'll update this in the future don't worry okay.  This is mainly a sort of prototype.

SOCIALS
YouTube (I will be posting a video I guess.)
